snippet.title: "Sonic Brick" fangame playthrough
snippet.description:
A playthrough of "Sonic Brick", developed by Johan Leion and released in 1997. Download it here: http://randomhoohaas.flyingomelette.com/ai/video/sonicbrick-fix.zip

An early-days Sonic fangame that's just plain ol' Breakout or Arkanoid, complete with Sonic's buddies and baddies as item tokens. Features some dodgy boss battles and unexpected MIDI choices, but a pretty solid game for 1997.
Level 7 has no completion state programmed in, so you can't proceed without passwords. I died after beating Metal Sonic in Level 8, so I glitched the completion state for that stage too.
